did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Williams James, Accession #6964-b, Clifton Waller Barrett Library of American Literature, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett on September 25, 1969, and changed to a gift on July 1, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collections consists of two items, correspondence of William James.

did.unittitle: William James to Effie Waring 1898 Oct 30;

scopecontent.p: Expresses sympathy on the death of Effie Waring's father, George Edwin Waring, mentions his own wife.

did.unittitle: William James to Daisy Waring n.y. Apr 26;

scopecontent.p: Acknowledges receipt of her letter and two books, reports on his bad health during the preceding winter, has spent a week recuperating in Salisbury, Connecticut.
